explorer
Class Main

java.lang.Object
  explorer.Main
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, FileHandler, fr.esrf.tangoatk.core.IStatusListener, Status
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminMain, ViewerMain
public abstract class Main
extends java.lang.Object
implements Status, FileHandler, fr.esrf.tangoatk.core.IStatusListener

Schema for the main class. This class contains what's common for the main "admin mode" and the main "user mode"

Author:
Erik ASSUM
